C

cmd.parser - package cmd.parser
The cmd.parser package provides utility classes for parsing command-line arguments and generating structured information from command-line options.
CommandLineParser - Class in cmd.parser
The CommandLineParser class provides utility methods for parsing command-line arguments and generating help messages for specified options.
CommandLineParser() - Constructor for class cmd.parser.CommandLineParser
 
CommandLineParser.ParsingOrder - Enum Class in cmd.parser
The ParsingOrder enum defines the different strategies for handling and ordering non-option arguments when parsing command-line arguments.

O

Option - Class in cmd.parser
The Option class represents a command-line option with both long and short argument names.

OptionType - Enum Class in cmd.parser

ORDER_OPTIONS_FIRST - Enum constant in enum class cmd.parser.CommandLineParser.ParsingOrder
Orders recognized options first, similar to GNU-like parsing.

P

parseArgumentsLooseDash(String[], Option[]) - Static method in class cmd.parser.CommandLineParser
Parses the command-line arguments in a more flexible way, supporting both long options with a single dash or double dash.

STOP_PARSING_AT_NON_OPTION - Enum constant in enum class cmd.parser.CommandLineParser.ParsingOrder
